code: import React from'react';import'./Project.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Project=_ref=>{let{project}=_ref;const{img,title,description,tags,ghLink,id}=project;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project ".concat(id%2===0?'even-project':''," animate"),"data-animate":"slideInLeft 2s",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:ghLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img,alt:title})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"project-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:ghLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-description",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"project-tags",children:tags.map((tag,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"tag",children:tag},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:ghLink,className:"btn project-btn",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"source"})})]})]});};export default Project;
